channel.title: Adobe on madd0's tech blog
channel.description: Recent content in Adobe on madd0's tech blog

item.title: On Jobs’s thoughts on Flash
item.description: Yesterday, our favourite black turtleneck-wearing guru published a short essay detailing his Thoughts on Flash, where he details why Adobe’s Flash will never by supported on his iPhones and iPads. Recommended reading, definitively! It’s just hilarious. I obviously have to admit that the iPhone, new Macs, etc. have sent Jobs soaring through the stratosphere. Unfortunately, I’m afraid his brain is now lacking oxygen… Take a look at some of Jobs’s points:

item.title: And the prize for best writing goes to…
item.description: …Adobe! For this magnificent dialog box in its ubiquitous Adobe Reader. The best part is that I couldn’t even open the PDF I wanted to open, and I’ll never know why :P Comments: Beedoo - Aug 3, 2009 I have the same :) It occurs when you open a pdf file through IE on Windows 7 ? If yes, try to download it and open it :) Qu’importe le navigateur, cela le fait également sous Chrome.
